Package io.github.jirkasa.servletrouter

Class HttpController

java.lang.Object
io.github.jirkasa.servletrouter.Controller<javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest,javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse>
io.github.jirkasa.servletrouter.HttpController
public abstract class HttpController extends Controller<javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest,javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse>
Implementation of Controller that uses HTTP protocol (HttpServletRequest and HttpServletResponse).

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    protected boolean
    skipUnimplementedMethods
    Determines whether handlers chain should continue or not when method is not implemented in subclass.

    continueHandlersChain()

      public boolean handle(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response) throws Exception

    • continueHandlersChain

      protected void continueHandlersChain()
      When called, the handlers chain will continue (another handlers/controllers that match request path will be called).
